metadata.title: CVE-2021-45944 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Ghostscript GhostPDL 9.50 through 9.53.3 has a use-after-free in sampled_data_sample (called from sampled_data_continue and interp).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-45944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2
ghostscript-x - 9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2
libgs9 - 9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2
libgs9-common - 9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.54.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu2').
